description:
Roll with confidence. This premium tube is inflated for 24 hours to ensure it’s leak-free, then it’s handpacked into a tapered shape that easily slides into your jersey pocket or seatbag.

  • Made with high-quality butyl rubber
  • High-quality brass valve (less prone to breaking in a pump) sits atop a smooth black valve stem
  • Comes with a patch of sandpaper and a glueless patch, in case you’re in a jam
  • Minimal packaging minimizes environmental impact
name: Rubbers 700 x 37-45C Tube (Threaded 48mm Presta Valve)
